CustomField.description: When a Promotion linked to this Release is merged into the Main Branch of the deployment flow, Copado will tag the Main Branch with this version number. This value is typically a major (e.g. v7), minor (v7.3) or patch (v7.3.2) release.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When a Promotion linked to this Release is merged into the Main Branch of the deployment flow, Copado will tag the Main Branch with this version number. This value is typically a major (e.g. v7), minor (v7.3) or patch (v7.3.2) release.
CustomField.label: Version
